works.description: Celebs have long been known to have a relationship with “bling” items of personal use, and many have used them to make their presence felt and add to their star power. After a sale of personal items belonging to Michael Jackson, a number of items with crystal embellishments were found, including his blinged glove and jacket, which he had worn during the creation of his album “Bad.” Next in line to the theme is the diamond-encrusted body armored glove, which fashionista and heiress to the Guinness fortune Daphne Guinness created in collaboration with Shaun Leane, who is well known in the fashion world
